## 紧急程度 / Urgency
- [ ] 不紧急 / Not urgent - 我可以等待 / I can wait
- [ ] 一般 / Normal - 几天内回复即可 / Response within a few days is fine
- [ ] 紧急 / Urgent - 影响我的工作 / Affecting my work
- [ ] 非常紧急 / Very urgent - 阻塞性问题 / Blocking issue
